mapper.insert: insert into article set title = #{title}, body = #{body}, mid =#{mid}, regDate=now(), hit=0
insert into reply set body = #{body}, mid =#{mid}, aid=#{aid}, regDate=now()
mapper.update: update Reply set body = #{body} where id =#{id}
update article set title = #{title}, body = #{body} where id =#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into `member` set loginId=#{loginId}, loginPw=#{loginPw}, nickname=#{nickname}, regDate=now()
mapper.select: select * from `member` where loginId=#{loginId} and loginPw=#{loginPw}
select a.*,m.nickname from article a inner join `member` m on a.mid=m.id where a.id =#{aid}
select r.*, m.nickname from Reply r inner join `member` m on r.mid=m.id where r.aid =#{aid}
